commandDescription.en-US: Tells you where to check known bugs of the game
commandDescription.fr: Te dit où consulter des bogues connus du jeu
commandDescription.pt-BR: Te diz onde checar bugs conhecidos do jogo

help.en-US: Type $<commandMention> to know where to check known bugs of the game
help.fr: Tape $<commandMention> pour savoir où consulter des bogues connus du jeu
help.pt-BR: Digite $<commandMention> pra saber onde checar bugs conhecidos do jogo

reply.en-US:
$<intent> check the known bugs of the game there:
$<linkList>
reply.fr:
$<intent> consulter des bogues connus du jeu là :
$<linkList>
reply.pt-BR:
$<intent> checar bugs conhecidos do jogo aqui:
$<linkList>

intentWithChannel.en-US: Before reporting a bug in $<channelMention>, you can
intentWithChannel.fr: Avant de rapporter un bogue dans $<channelMention>, tu peux
intentWithChannel.pt-BR: Antes de reportar um bug em $<channelMention>, você pode
